{{book | title=Carandaith Volume 2, Number 1 | image = Carandaith Vol.2, No.1.png | editor=[[Paul Novitski|Alpajpuri]] | illustrator=Dan Osterman (cover) | publisher=Australian Tolkien Society | date=January [[1970]] | format=Magazine | pages= | noisbn=None }} '''''Carandaith'' Vol. 2, No. 1''' is an issue of the magazine [[Carandaith]], published by the [[Australian Tolkien Society]]. A letter from [[Joy Hill]] (of [[Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]]) includes an extract from [[Letter to Joy Hill (June 1969)|a letter sent by Tolkien]] discussing a film adaptation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (cf. p. 67).{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=55360|articlename=Carandaith. January 1970|dated=|website=TB|accessed=}}
